title: Antonio Vivaldi Le quattro stagioni The Four Seasons (Karajan An
description:
(Violin Concerto) Antonio Vivaldi - Le quattro stagioni / Seasons / The Four Seasons (Karajan; Anne-Sophie Mutter) - 1987, DVD-5 (orig.)


Antonio Vivaldi
Le quattro Stagioni

Distribution Series KARAJAN-100



Genre: Cycle 4 of the Concerto for Violin, Strings and Basso Continuo
Record Date: October 28, 1987, chamber hall of the Berlin Philharmonic
Label: Sony Classical
Duration: 48 min., 18 sec.
Available Regions: All
Quality: DVD-5
format: DVD Video
Video codec: MPEG2
Audio Codec: LPCM, 2 ch, Dolby AC3, 6 ch
Video: PAL 4:3 (720x576) VBR, 25.00fps
Format: DDD

Extras. Information: Not everyone would be able to play the harpsichord to the soundtrack. 
Maestro Karajan does not hesitate to public and video cameras.

Concerto for Violin and Strings in E, Op.8, No.1, R.269 "La Primavera"

1. Allegro 
2. Largo 
3. Allegro (Danza pastorale)

Concerto for Violin and Strings in G minor, Op.8, No.2, R.315 "L'estate"

1. Allegro non molto - Allegro 
2. Adagio - Presto - Adagio 
3. Presto (Tempo impetuoso d'estate)

Concerto for Violin and Strings in F, Op.8, No.3, R.293 "L'autunno"

1. Allegro (Ballo, e canto de 'villanelli) 
2. Adagio molto (Ubriachi dormienti) 
3. Allegro (La caccia)

Concerto for Violin and Strings in F minor, Op.8, No.4, R.297 "L'inverno"

1. Allegro non molto 
2. Largo 
3. Allegro

. 
Anne-Sophie Mutter - Violin

Berliner Philharmoniker
Herbert von Karajan 
(the harpsichord - Maestro)
